entry.title: Homepage
entry.content:
Hi! This is Yanwei Sun. Welcome to my website, where you can know me in details.

Contact Info: yanweisun1202@gmail.com ; LinkedIn

Education:

Research Interest: Decision-Making  Text/Data Mining  Self Organizing System

Selected Awards/Honors:

  • The Third Grade Prize in 2018 Globa Management Challenge(2018)
